properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 7:50AM CST until February 10 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo and Sumter Counties.

.Heavy rainfall of three to four inches have fallen over the
Tombigbee River basin...and a flood warning is now in effect for the
Tombigbee River at Gainesville Lock and Dam.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam.
* from Friday morning to Monday afternoon...or until the Warning is
cancelled.
* At  7:30 AM Thursday The stage Was 89.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 101.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late Friday morning  and
continue to rise to near 103.6 feet by early Saturday afternoon.
The river will fall below flood stage by early Monday morning.
* Impact...At 101 feet...Flooding of low lying agricultural and
wooded lands in the area occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
